info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.was.user_token
info.description: Use this API to get one time user token to connect to Web App Scanning Service

get.summary: Get Web App Scanning Service User Token
get.description: Get one time token to connect Web App Scanning Service

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

/api/config/namespaces/system/was/user_t.x-displayname: Web App Scanning Service User Token API

x-displayname: Web App Scanning Service User Token API

user_tokenGetUserTokenResponse.description: Response body of token to connect to the Web App Scanning Service
user_tokenGetUserTokenResponse.title: GetUserTokenResponse
user_tokenGetUserTokenResponse.x-displayname: Web App Scanning Service User Token Response

redirect_url.description:
The Web App Scanning Service URL to be redirected by F5 Distributed Cloud Console

Example: ` "https://app.heyhack.com/logout"`
redirect_url.title: Web App Scanning Service Redirect URL
redirect_url.x-displayname: Web App Scanning Service Redirect URL

token.description:
The token to connect to Web App Scanning Service

Example: ` "blahblah"`
token.title: Web App Scanning Service User Token
token.x-displayname: Web App Scanning Service User Token

user_id.description:
The User ID of Web App Scanning Service

Example: ` "blah|662ab03aeff9c175ea1310c1"`
user_id.title: Web App Scanning Service User ID
user_id.x-displayname: Web App Scanning Service User ID
